item.title: Conception, Construction and Evaluation of a Raspberry Pi Cluster
item.author: Author
item.description: The goal of this work is to create an affordable, energy efficient and portable mini-supercomputer. Ideally, a cluster computer with little or no carbon footprint, individual elements that are inexpensive to replace, and a portable system that can be easily disassembled and reassembled.

item.title: Automatically clean up local once remote branch is deleted
item.author: Author
item.description: Use this nice PowerShell and Bash one-liner to automatically clean up (delete) your local branch once your remote branch is deleted (merged).

item.title: How to install Azure CLI
item.author: Author
item.description: Let’s keep it easy with these one-liner’s you can use for Windows as well as Linux to install or update Azure CLI.
